snippet: Republican lawmakers have deleted a provision that would regulate the collection of “political intelligence” from political insiders for the use of hedge funds, mutual funds and other investors.
abstract: House Republicans, drafting bill to ban insider trading by lawmakers, remove a provision that would regulate the collection of 'political intelligence' from political insiders for the use of hedge funds, mutual funds and other investors; Democrats protest the change, but admit they will still vote for the bill when it reaches the House floor.
lead_paragraph: Republican lawmakers have deleted a provision that would regulate the collection of “political intelligence” from political insiders for the use of hedge funds, mutual funds and other investors.

headline.seo: House Republicans Cut an Ethics Bill Provision
headline.main: G.O.P. Leaders in House Remove Part of Ethics Bill
headline.print_headline: G.O.P. Leaders in House Excise Part of Ethics Bill
